availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Owen County and Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Septimus Rankin and Rebecca Rankin. Married to Martha Ellen Lowderback in Owen County, Kentucky, on March 11, 1861. Father of Nancy J. Rankin. Resident in Owen County in 1850. Resident in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1860. Farmer in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 1, p. 253B
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Division 1, p. 351.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Lockport, p. 314A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Owen County Marriages, Film #000272769, p.178.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), 5th Congressional District, KY, August 1863, p. 422.
